etl.description: Imports source taxonomic data to a temporary table
etl.query:
,,,,,,,,,,,^(?!unranked).*$
INSERT INTO sapin.tmp_taxon_scientific_name ( src_taxon_name_id, taxonomic_status, scientific_name, canonical_name, scientific_name_authorship, generic_name, specific_epithet, infraspecific_epithet, name_published_in, src_accepted_name_id, src_parent_name_id, taxon_rank ) VALUES ( ?taxonID,
upper(regexp_replace(?taxonomicStatus, '(.*) (.*)', '\2'))::sapin.taxonomic_status_enum, ?scientificName, ?canonicalName, ?scientificNameAuthorship, ?genericName, ?specificEpithet, ?infraspecificEpithet, ?namePublishedIn, ?acceptedNameUsageID, ?originalNameUsageID, ?parentNameUsageID, upper(?taxonRank)::sapin.taxon_rank_enum )
